backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing CRUD operations for exercises, workouts, and weight entries with validation for equipment types and muscle groups.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (dark mode, exercise library, workout creation, weight logging, progress tracking) to their corresponding files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of frontend files describing the dark mode styling, routing, React Query hooks, navigation, and all page components for the fitness tracking app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining dark mode theme variables and base styles for the fitness application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the FitTrack Pro application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for exercises, workouts, logging, and progress pages, wrapped in dark theme provider.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying exercise details with color-coded badges for equipment type and muscle group.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header navigation with app branding and active-state links to Exercises, Workouts, Log, and Progress pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing authenticated/anonymous backend actor instances with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation using @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating workout data including exercises, workouts, and weight entries, using the backend actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, destructive, and chart color definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseLibrary.tsx: Displays a filterable exercise library with equipment and muscle group filters, includes a seed button to populate initial exercises, and renders ExerciseCard components.
frontend/src/pages/LogWeight.tsx: Form page for logging weight entries with exercise selection, weight, reps, and sets inputs, showing success feedback after submission.
frontend/src/pages/WeightProgress.tsx: Displays weight progress history for a selected exercise with trend indicators (up/down/same) comparing consecutive entries and formatted dates.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutDetail.tsx: Displays details of a single workout including its name and number of exercises, with navigation back to the workouts list and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutForm.tsx: Form component for creating or editing workouts with name input, searchable exercise selection with toggle functionality, and save/update mutations with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutsList.tsx: Lists all user workouts with a button to create new workouts, currently showing an empty state placeholder when no workouts exist.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extending colors using OKLCH color space, custom fonts (Inter and Rajdhani), animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features including dark mode, exercise filtering, workout creation, weight logging, and progress tracking with pending feature requests.
